Package com.telenav.kivakit.core.string

package com.telenav.kivakit.core.string
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.telenav.kivakit.core
     
  • Class
    Description
    Align
    Aligns a string within a given width using a padding character: Align.center(String, int, char), Align.leftAlign(String, int, char) or Align.rightAlign(String, int, char).
    AsciiArt
    Provides methods to create "ASCII art", including: Banners Lines Boxes Bulleted lists
    AsciiArt.TextBoxStyle
     
    AsIndentedString
    An StringFormattable sub-interface that traverses a tree of objects, adding information to an ObjectIndenter object as it goes.
    AsString
    Interface to an object that can produce one or more different kinds of string representations.
    Brackets
    Adds and removes brackets around text
    CaseFormat
    Converts between different styles of casing: camelCase Capitalized lower-hyphenated UPPER_UNDERSCORE
    Differences
    Tracks the difference between objects that are compared with Differences.compare(String, Object, Object) or Differences.compare(String, Iterable, Iterable).
    Escape
    Escapes different kinds of strings for JavaScript, SQL and XML.
    FormatProperty
    Annotation for properties that are format-able with ObjectFormatter.
    Formatter
    Handles message formatting, given a message and an argument array.
    Indent
    Methods for indenting text
    IndentingStringBuilder
    Builds a string with indentation levels.
    IndentingStringBuilder.Indentation
    A level of indentation in spaces
    IndentingStringBuilder.Style
     
    Join
    Joins collections together with separator characters.
    ObjectFormatter
    A convenient class for formatting particular fields and methods of an object as a debugging string.
    ObjectFormatter.ObjectFormat
    The format to use for properties of an object.
    ObjectIndenter
    Holds state information during an object tree traversal by AsIndentedString.
    Packages
    Utility methods to use for working with package names
    Paths
    Utility methods for working with string paths.
    Plural
    Simple heuristic algorithms for pluralizing English words, used to make output a little friendlier.
    Separators
    Maintains a list of separators that can be nested when used by list converters and converters with multiple separated fields.
    Split
    String splitting utilities.
    StringConversions
    String conversion utilities
    Strings
    General purpose utilities for Java strings.
    StringSimilarity
    Methods for comparing strings, including by Levenshtein distance.
    Strip
    Strips leading and ending values, package prefixes and quotes from strings.
    Wrap
    Wraps text at a given width.
